title: Ingaruka Zacu Zose Hamwe
subtitle: Reba uko umuryango wacu w'ababika urimo guhindura uburezi bw'abana ku isi hose
impactBasedOn: Dushingiye ku mpano zacu zose za {{amount}}, dore ingaruka dukeka twakoze hamwe.
transparencyP1: Muri AidVault, twizera ko ufite uburenganzira bwo kumenya neza aho impano zawe zigenda. Buri faranga ikurikiranwa kuva mu bwizigame bwawe kugeza ku bana bungukira. Dukorana gusa n'abaparineri b'uburezi basuzumwe mu bihugu 15+ bafite indangagaciro imwe yo gusuzumwa.
transparencyP2: Raporo zacu z'ingaruka za buri gisanzwe zisobanura buri gahunda, kandi amashyirahamwe y'abaparineri bacu batanga isuzuma ku butaka ko ibikoresho n'ubwizigame bigeraho. Iki si ugutanga gusa - ni ingaruka zikurikiranwa, zemejwe.
joinSaversCount: Ifatanye na {{count}} babika barimo guhindura ubuzima bw'abana binyuze ku bubasha bwo gutanga busangiwe.
